Class Line

java.lang.Object
  Line

public class Line
extends java.lang.Object

A class representing a Line Segment.

Author:
Rob Schreiber

Constructor Summary
Line(Point a, Point b)
          Creates a Line object from the two supplied points
 
Method Summary
 double getLength()
          Calculates the length of the line segment.
 Point getMidpoint()
          Calculates the midpoint of the line segment.
 Line getPerpBisector()
          Returns a line segment of the same length as this line with a slope perpendicular to this line running through this line's midpoint

          Returns the slope of line segments perpendicular to this one

          Returns the first point of the line segment.

          Returns the second point of the line segment.

getPerpBisector
